properties.title: GBIF_data
properties.description: Script built to download and pre-process GBIF occurrence data of the diagnostic species of the EUNIS Habitat S22

input-data-used-1.description: Occurrence data for Dryas octopetala and its taxonomical synonyms, downloaded from GBIF, using the R script
